title: Growing evidence: Water as a potential treatment for inherited cause of kidney failure

title_detail.value: Growing evidence: Water as a potential treatment for inherited cause of kidney failure

summary: People with polycystic kidney disease (PKD) could benefit from a moderate increase in water intake, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: People with polycystic kidney disease (PKD) could benefit from a moderate increase in water intake, according to new research.
